plot: After tangling with a werewolf on Navajo land, Ben starts becoming one.

During the Tennysons stop at a Native American Reservation to visit an old friend of Grandpa's, the settlement is attacked by a Yenaldooshi (a Navajo werewolf). Ben fights him off as Wildvine but, once bitten, soon starts turning into a werewolf himself. Folklore dictates they have one day before the next full moon to cure Ben before his condition becomes permanent.—Jesse Sanchez
